info.name: Buy Together API Documentation
info.description: This API aims to provide all the information you need in order to work with our API

item.name: Authentication
item.description: Endpoints for login, registration, and logout

formdata.description: Must not be greater than 255 characters.
Must be a valid email address.

request.description:
This endpoint allows you to register a new user.
<aside class="notice">
Users will not be able to create or join purchase goals if they are not registered and logged in
</aside>

This endpoint allows authenticate or log in a user.
<aside class="notice">
An authentication token is always generated upon successful login.
</aside>

This endpoint allows you to logout a user from your app.
<aside class="notice">
It requires the auth token of the user to be logged out
</aside>

item.name: Change the status of specified purchase goal

variable.description: The ID of the purchase goal.

request.description:
<aside class="notice">
Only the owner of the goal can change its status from open to close and vice versa.
</aside>

This endpoint allows users to view purchase goals.
<aside class="notice">
Users must NOT be authenticated to access this endpoint.
</aside>

item.name: Fetch details of a specific purchase goal.

variable.description: The ID of the purchase goal.

request.description: This endpoint allows users to view the details of a purchase goal by ID.

formdata.description: Must not be greater than 255 characters.

formdata.value: Quibusdam incidunt vitae quia dolor ut aut est.

formdata.description: Must not be greater than 255 characters.
Must be a valid date. Must be a date after or equal to start_date.

request.description:
This endpoint allows users to create a purchase goal.
<aside class="notice">
Users must be authenticated to access this endpoint.
</aside>

variable.description: The ID of the purchase goal.

formdata.description: Must not be greater than 255 characters.
Must not be greater than 255 characters.
Must be a valid date. Must be a date after or equal to start_date.

request.description:
This endpoint allows users to update details of a purchase goal.
<aside class="notice">
Only the owner of the goal can update it.
</aside>

variable.description: The ID of the purchase goal.

request.description:
This endpoint allows users to delete a specific purchase goal by ID.
<aside class="notice">
Only the owner of the goal can delete it.
</aside>

item.name: User Participation
item.description: Endpoints for managing user participation in purchase goals

item.name: Get participants of a purchase goal.

variable.description: The ID of the purchase goal.

request.description: Retrieve all participants of a specified purchase goal.

variable.description: The ID of the purchase goal.

request.description: Allows a user to join a specific purchase goal.

variable.description: The ID of the purchase goal.

request.description: Allows a user to APPROVE another user to join purchase goal.

item.name: Decline request to join a purchase goal.

variable.description: The ID of the purchase goal.

request.description: Allows user to DECLINE a request from another user to join purchase goal.
